data.title: Milk 2% M.F
data.description:
We are driven by a simple belief: we can always make the world better. Proper nourishment allows us all to grow and thrive. All our milk flows through soft filters to concentrate protein while filtering out half of the natural sugars. Our delicious fairlife ultra-filtered milk has 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk. Plus, there are no artificial growth hormones used and it's lactose-free. So sip, drink, and chug as you enjoy our delicious ultra-filtered milk, eh?

  • Made with 100% quality Canadian milk
  • 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular chocolate milk
  • Delicious, satisfying, and lactose-free
  • No artificial growth hormones used

data.title: Ultrapur Protein Ultra-Filtered Milk 2%
data.description:
Get more of what you want with Lactantia UltraPur Ultrafiltered Milk. Unlike regular milk, this partly skimmed high protein milk is also ideal for those who require lactose free milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 2% high-protein milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of 10 essential nutrients and no sugar added, this milk is a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the power of farm-fresh flavour with ultrafiltered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Made with ultrafiltered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • 20g of protein per serving
  • Lactose free
  • 2% M.F.
  • Source of 10 essential nutrients
  • No added sugar
  • 1.5 L

name: DAIRY MILK Almond Milk Chocolate Bar

data.title: DAIRY MILK Almond Milk Chocolate Bar
data.description:
Unwind with the timeless taste of wholesome chopped almonds and the smooth flavour of CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate. A CADBURY DAIRY MILK Almond Chocolate Bar is the perfect go-to treat for nut lovers craving something sweet and crunchy. From stealing a moment to yourself at work, this satisfying chocolate bar fits a wide range of occasions.

  • MILK CHOCOLATE & ALMONDS: The CADBURY DAIRY MILK Almond Chocolate Bar is the perfect treat for nut lovers. This delectable chocolate bar combines the creamy taste of CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate with a nutty, almond crunch.
  • CLASSIC CRUNCH: When you want the crunch of rich, nutty almonds and melt-in-your-mouth CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate, the CADBURY DAIRY MILK Almond Chocolate Bar is the treat to reach for. Savour the blend of smooth and crunchy flavours.
  • PERFECT FOR ME-TIME: When it’s time to tune out of a busy day or unwind with your favourite show, a CADBURY DAIRY MILK Almond Chocolate Bar is a great choice for indulgent moments.
  • COCOA LIFE: Our sustainable cocoa sourcing program does good by encouraging responsible farming and by helping fight deforestation while supporting cocoa farming communities. Learn more at cocoalife.org
  • BELOVED BRAND: CADBURY DAIRY MILK is loved by Canadians, delivering quality and joy in every bite. Savour the simple pleasure in every piece. Proudly made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients.

data.title: DAIRY MILK Hazelnut Chocolate Bar
data.description:
A nutty classic for nut lovers everywhere. Made with wholesome chopped hazelnuts and silky smooth CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate, you can enjoy it with your coffee or tea, or use it in a recipe to enhance desserts like brownies, cookies, or even chocolate fondue. Whatever the occasion, a CADBURY DAIRY MILK Hazelnut Chocolate Bar pairs perfectly with relaxing and unwinding from the day.

  • MILK CHOCOLATE & HAZELNUTS: When you're craving smooth CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate with a satisfying, nutty crunch, reach for a CADBURY DAIRY MILK Hazelnut Chocolate Bar. It’s the ideal size for a coffee break at work or relaxing at home.
  • CHOCOLATEY CRUNCH: Treat yourself to a timeless classic of chopped hazelnuts and the smooth, creamy taste of CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate. It's the perfect combination of crunchy hazelnuts and CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate.
  • PERFECT FOR ME-TIME: Relax with a CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate bar made for nut lovers. Featuring crunchy hazelnuts and CADBURY DAIRY MILK milk chocolate, it’s perfect for a workday escape or an after-dinner treat with your favourite show.
  • COCOA LIFE: Our sustainable cocoa sourcing program does good by encouraging responsible farming and by helping fight deforestation while supporting cocoa farming communities. Learn more at cocoalife.org
  • BELOVED BRAND: CADBURY DAIRY MILK is loved by Canadians, delivering quality and joy in every bite. Savour the simple pleasure in every piece. Proudly made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients.

data.title: Grass Fed 2% Milk
data.description: Rich in nutrients, milk has been a food staple for centuries. Used in cooking, baking or simply as a wholesome beverage, Milk is a great way to get calcium and protein into your diet. Whole milk contains at least 3.25% milk fat. When a portion of the milk’s fat is removed, it becomes partly skimmed milk, such as 2% milk and 1% milk, depending on the quantity removed. Skim milk is virtually fat-free, with only about 0.1% fat.

data.title: Purfiltre Partially Skimmed Milk 1%
data.description:
Taste the goodness every day with Lactantia PurFiltre 1% Filtered Partially Skimmed Milk. Sourced from Canadian dairies, every drop of this 100% Canadian milk is carefully filtered to provide a smooth, pure taste that stays fresh longer without preservatives. Source of calcium and protein, this low fat milk also contains vitamins A and D, making it a nutritious and delicious choice for the whole family. A delightful, refreshing choice on its own, with cereal, or in blended coffee drinks. Rediscover the farm-fresh flavour of fine filtered milk. Lactantia, for Milk Connoisseurs!

  • Smooth and delicious filtered milk that stays fresh longer without preservatives
  • 100% Canadian milk from Canadian dairies
  • Reduced fat, partially skimmed milk with 1% M.F.
  • Good source of calcium
  • 9 g of protein per serving
  • Vitamins A & D
  • 2 L

data.title: Lactose Free 2% Dairy Product
data.description: Through our unique process, we can preserve the deliciously pure taste of fresh milk in every glass of our products, while removing the lactose that can cause you discomfort. So you can once again benefit from an excellent source of calcium, vitamin D and protein, plus a source of vitamin A. That’s everything you need to maintain a well-balanced diet.

data.title: Evaporated Milk
data.description: Carnation Evaporated Milk is a shelf stable milk that is richer and creamier than milk because some of the water has been removed. With a slight carmelized flavour, it's a easy and delicious ingredient to bake and cook with.

data.title: Evaporated Milk
data.description:
Evaporated Milk gives body to smoothies or thickens up your soups and chowders. With vitamins C and D added, it adds creaminess and richness to your favourite meals or dessert recipes.

Almond Breeze is a great tasting, no-dairy beverage. It is rich and creamy with a pleasant aftertaste.

Delicious tasting Almond Brezze.

Blue Diamond has been producing almonds since 1910. No one knows them, or loves them, like we do. Our 3000 plus growers are dedicated to producing delicious tasting and nutritious almonds for Almond Breeze..

From the Almond People
